author: wtopstaff
title: Senators-Sabres Sums
text:
First Period_1, Ottawa, Turris 1 (Hoffman, Stone), :30. Penalties_None. 
Second Period_2, Ottawa, Turris 2 (Hoffman, Stone), 10:49. Penalties_Pageau, Ott (hooking), 15:46. 
Third Period_3, Buffalo, Eichel 1 (Foligno, Kane), 9:11 (pp). 4, Ottawa, Lazar 1 (Zibanejad, Ryan), 18:56 (en). Penalties_Wiercioch, Ott (hooking), 7:45; Ryan, Ott (hooking), 13:50. 
Shots on Goal_Ottawa 7-11-4_22. Buffalo 6-7-14_27. 
Power-play opportunities_Ottawa 0 of 0; Buffalo 1 of 3. 
Goalies_Ottawa, Anderson 1-0-0 (27 shots-26 saves). Buffalo, Lehner 0-1-0 (12-11), Johnson (7:30 second, 9-8). 
A_19,070 (19,070). T_2:37. 
Referees_Frederick L’Ecuyer, Dan O’Rourke. Linesmen_Ryan Galloway, Bryan Pancich. Topics:
